attributes.contentHtml: eraters Admins do not need to act professional, it is there system you are using & they can ban you, or do anything FOR NO OR ANY REASON!!, FalixNodes; was also allowed to ban people for NO reason, on there server, because people were damaging their reputation, I am also allowed to ban people on samurai hosting (and my future host lightning host, I'll make a thread about it, when it releases.), I can BAN, KICK, TAKE SOMEONE OFF OUR SERVERS FOR ANY REASON, BECAUSE IT IS MY SYSTEM YOU ARE USING!!!!!!!!!
